page.title: 19AN ADULT'S DAY IN DONCASTER
page.content: OUR COMMUNITY POLICE CONSTABLE COVERS THE INTAKE AREA.HIS JOB INVOLVES MEETING PEOPLE;DEALING WITH INCIDENTS AND MAKING SURE ALL IS WELL. HE GETS UP ANY TIME THAT SUITS HIS SHIFT AND HAS CEREAL FOR BREAKFAST WITH COFFEE THEN HE HELPS WITH JOBS AROUND THE HOUSE BEFORE GOING ON DUTY. HE CYCLES TO HIS POLICE BOX AND STARTS WORK BY TELEPHONING THE MAIN DONCASTER STATION TO RECEIVE WAITING MESSAGES. ONCE PUT IN A SUITABLE ORDER HE THEN GOES ON HIS BEAT TO DEAL WITH THEM. THEFTS,TRAFFIC ACCIDENTS,SUDDEN DEATHS, BURGLARIES,ASSAULTS AND OTHER PROBLEMS IN HIS AREA MAY NEED INVESTIGATING.LOTS OF PAPERWORK IS INVOLVED BEFORE HE REPORTS OFF DUTY AT THE END OF HIS SHIFT. AFTER WORK OUR COMMUNITY P.C. LIKES TO PURSUE HIS INTERESTS IN BIRDS,THE GUITAR AND DRAWING.
